short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download product images and videos from Chinese ecommerce

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool helps you download main, variant and description images & videos from Chinese ecommerce websites such as alibaba.com and aliexpress.com

- You can click on the icons that will show up on the page, or you can download using the buttons in the popup.

- The images will be saved as a zip on your computer.

- You can also download the description text.

We may promote our related extensions to users by showing promotional banners. We only promote those of our other extensions which may be useful to our users.

We are not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with Alibaba Group, or any of its subsidiaries or its affiliates.
